title: Dom Phillips's family inaccurately told by Brazilian officials bodies had been found
content:
1. Dom Phillips's family inaccurately told by Brazilian officials bodies had been found  The Washington Post
  2. No bodies found in hunt for journalist and expert, Brazil police say  Reuters
  3. Defending the Amazon is a dangerous undertaking. Critics say Bolsonaro is making it worse  CNN
  4. Brazilian Authorities Deny Reports Of Bodies Found In Missing Journalist Search  NBC News
  5. Second suspect arrested in case of missing British reporter in Brazil's Amazon - police  Reuters.com

localize.title: ドム・フィリップスさんの遺族は、ブラジル政府から遺体発見と誤って伝えられた。
